meta.name: description
meta.content: Enrol in upGrad's online courses to gain certification in data science, digital marketing, product management, machine learning, software development, and more. Get the unique upGrad experience - learn through a content co-developed by academia and industry experts & get a dedicated mentor and career support.

meta.name: description
meta.content: Enrol in upGrad's online courses to gain certification in data science, digital marketing, product management, machine learning, software development, and more. Get the unique upGrad experience - learn through a content co-developed by academia and industry experts & get a dedicated mentor and career support.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Enrol in upGrad's online courses to gain certification in data science, digital marketing, product management, machine learning, software development, and more. Get the unique upGrad experience - learn through a content co-developed by academia and industry experts & get a dedicated mentor and career support.

link.title: upGrad | Learning Platform

div.h2: Please enable Javascript in your browser.
div.div: Go to Settings -> Site Settings -> Javascript -> Enable

div.class: pop_over close header_segment avatar_wrapper pop_tip_right light

div.p: Introduction: In this checkpoint, you will create the Header component for your application. Header is the part that is present throughout the application and hence, is a common component.

ol.li: In the common folder, create a folder titled header. Inside the header folder, create Header.js (following naming convention for a component) and Header.css files.
Create a class component with empty divs in the Header.js file called Header, and import the Header.css file in it.

The header should have the following CSS properties:
The background colour of the header must be #222.
It should have a height of 36px.
It must have padding from the top of 8px, bottom of 8px, right of 32px and left of 16px.
Apply these CSS properties to the Header component in the Header.js file using the className attribute.

li.p: You are provided with scalable vector graphics in this segment in the form of a logo.svg file. You must include this in the header with the animation and style properties listed below:
It should have the background colour #ff7f7f.
It should have a height of 35px.
It should rotate infinitely with a complete cycle of 8 seconds, and the speed curve of the animation should be linear.
It should be on the left of the header.

div.p: Note: Ensure to commit the project and push it to GitHub whenever you complete a checkpoint or a feature with an appropriate commit message. This will be considered while grading your project, and there will be penalties for not having incremental commits with appropriate commit messages.
